title: Newborn BCG Vaccine : University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
sitename: University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
cleaned_text: Please don't come to hospital if you have symptoms of COVID-19 Please contact the ward before visiting as restrictions may apply. More information can be found on our COVID-19 webpage > Please contact the ward before visiting as restrictions may apply. More information can be found on our COVID-19 webpage > Is the Emergency Department (A&E) the right place for you? The Emergency Department (ED) is for patients requiring emergency care for life-threatening conditions. Please use the service carefully so it can best support those with serious conditions. Find out more > Newborn BCG Vaccine Printing of this document is only valid on the day printed, please refer to the website for most up to date information: Was this page helpful? Let us know
